headline: Is Honeywell International (HON) Attractive After Recent Share Price Strength And Valuation Signals
summary: If you are looking at Honeywell International and wondering whether the current price makes sense, this article walks through what the market might be implying about its value and what that could mean for you. Honeywell's shares last closed at US$221.46, with returns of 0.9% over 7 days, 12.5% over 30 days, 13.1% year to date, 8.4% over 1 year, 20.5% over 3 years and 33.2% over 5 years. These figures provide a useful backdrop before comparing that price to underlying value. Recent attention...
